hanzi-su-wiki:
慢

Значения

Лень, халатность; высокомерие

Мнемоника

Свойство 忄 характера — лень, в авантюризм 冒 и одна видимость. Лентяй делает всё как бы на ощупь 又, не прилагая усилий.

purpleculture_info:
Synonym: 缓
Antonyms: 快
Pictophonetic: 曼 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
慢慢 [ màn màn ]: slowly
缓慢 [ huǎn màn ]: slow; slow-moving
慢性 [ màn xìng ]: slow and patient; chronic (disease); slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
傲慢 [ ào màn ]: arrogant; haughty
怠慢 [ dài màn ]: to slight; to neglect
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 曼 [ màn ] long, extended, vast; beautiful
CONTEXT_sherlock:
慢慢Slowly
卷发男人慢慢地拿出了一张报纸。The curly-haired man slowly took out a newspaper.
谢先生慢慢说。Mr. Xie said slowly.
谢先生又说，“他带我慢慢地往办公室走。Mr. Xie said again, "He took me to the office slowly.
heisig_chinese_memo: When all of your actions are drawn out your state of mind is slow. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: ridicule, Freud, state of mind, mandala, sun, day, eye, cross-eyed, net, crotch
koohiiStory1: I´ll focus on the mandala primitive here. I guess Heisig chose this keyword for phonetic reasons and as a character it´s the "man" in mandara/mandala (曼荼羅). A mandala is a graphic representation of the universe, here split in 3 planes of existance, the sun representing the cosmos, the eye represents the human observer, the crotch represents the animal instincts.
koohiiStory2: He´ s often ridiculed for having his eye on crotches all day.
jp_example_words:
怠慢(たいまん): negligence, procrastination, carelessness
我慢(がまん): patience, endurance, perseverance, tolerance, self-control, self-denial
自慢(じまん): pride, boast
WaniKani_Radicals: 忄, 日, 罒, 又
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If your soul is acting like the sun trapped in a net sitting on a stool, then people will ridicule you for your laziness. You're just sitting there, trapped and not moving.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Your soul just doesn't want to move or do anything though... and that may look like laziness, but you can't help it. You wish your friends and family wouldn't ridicule you. You're going through enough, internally.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When people ridicule you, when you can't stop the laziness, you read manga (まん). Manga helps you feel better about the mean things people say. Manga helps you feel like you're doing something, and that you aren't just a lazy person.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself reading manga and watch as the people who ridicule you and call you lazy fade away into the background. You're going to be okay.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 慢 (マン высокомерие, выдержка), 漫 (マン пустота, манга)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When all of your actions are drawn out your state of mind is slow. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " heart " and " man " sound, the original meaning is laziness and laziness. "Said Wen": "Idleness. From the heart, graceful. One said: Slow, not fearful." "Xunzi ‧ Meticulous": "A gentleman is generous but not slow." Tang Yangli's note: "The same as slow. Laziness too."

" Slow " can mean arrogance. "Yi·XiCi": "Slow up and down violently, thievery and violent." Kong Yingdashu: "The villain at the top will be arrogant, and below will be tyrannical."

" Slow " also means contempt. "Thirty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "I am far away and slow." Du pre-note: "Slow, easy."

" Slow " also means slow travel. "Poetry. Zheng Feng. Uncle Yu Tian": "Uncle Ma is slow to avoid, but uncle is seldom." Zheng Xuanjian: "When the field is finished, the horse will be late." The meaning of slow action can be extended to slow. Tang Bai Juyi "Pipa Xing": "Cross lightly and slowly twist and pick."

" Slow " also means not solid. "Huainanzi ‧ Shi Zexun": "Fortifications are slow, and as an obscene skill, they must commit their sins." Gao Yin's note: "Slow, not fast."

" Slow " also refers to simplicity. "Confucius's Family Language-Confucianism": "It is as slow as it is slow, and as if it is false." Wang Su's note: "Slow, simple."

" Slow " also refers to relaxation and intemperance. "Mencius-Teng Wen Gong 1": "The realm of Confucianism is not righteous, the mine field is not good, and the land of the valley is not fair, so tyrants and corrupt officials will slow down their realm."

Miscellaneous tunes are also called " slow ". Ming Yang Shen's "Sheng'an Shihua" Volume 12: "The slow word is the name of the music."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " man ", the original meaning is laziness and laziness.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「曼」聲，本義為怠惰、懈怠。《說文》：「惰也。从心，曼聲。一曰：慢，不畏也。」《荀子‧不苟》：「君子寬而不慢。」唐楊倞注：「僈與慢同，怠惰也。」

　　「慢」可表示傲慢。《易‧繫辭上》：「上慢下暴，盜思伐之矣。」孔穎達疏：「小人居上位必驕慢，而在下必暴虐。」

　　「慢」還表示輕視。《左傳‧襄公三十一年》：「我遠而慢之。」杜預注：「慢，易也。」

　　「慢」亦表示緩行。《詩‧鄭風‧大叔於田》：「叔馬慢忌，叔發罕忌。」鄭玄箋：「田事且畢，則其馬行遲。」 由緩行義可引申為緩慢。唐白居易〈琵琶行〉：「輕攏慢撚抹復挑。」

　　「慢」也指不堅實。《淮南子‧時則訓》：「工事苦慢，作為淫巧，必行其罪。」高誘注：「慢，不牢也。」

　　「慢」還指簡略。《孔子家語‧儒行》：「其大讓如慢，小讓如偽。」王肅注：「慢，簡略也。」

　　「慢」亦指放鬆、無節制。《孟子‧滕文公上》：「經界不正，井田不鈞，穀祿不平，是故暴君汙吏必慢其經界。」

　　雜曲曲調名也稱為「慢」。明楊慎《升庵詩話》卷十二：「慢字為樂曲名。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「曼」聲，本義為怠惰、懈怠。

從「 心 」，「 曼 」聲，本義為怠惰、懈怠。《說文》：「惰也。从心，曼聲。一曰：慢，不畏也。」《荀子‧不苟》：「君子寬而不慢。」唐楊倞注：「僈與慢同，怠惰也。」 「 慢 」可表示傲慢。《易‧繫辭上》：「上慢下暴，盜思伐之矣。」孔穎達疏：「小人居上位必驕慢，而在下必暴虐。」 「 慢 」還表示輕視。《左傳‧襄公三十一年》：「我遠而慢之。」杜預注：「慢，易也。」 「 慢 」亦表示緩行。《詩‧鄭風‧大叔於田》：「叔馬慢忌，叔發罕忌。」鄭玄箋：「田事且畢，則其馬行遲。」 由緩行義可引申為緩慢。唐白居易〈琵琶行〉：「輕攏慢撚抹復挑。」 「 慢 」也指不堅實。《淮南子‧時則訓》：「工事苦慢，作為淫巧，必行其罪。」高誘注：「慢，不牢也。」 「 慢 」還指簡略。《孔子家語‧儒行》：「其大讓如慢，小讓如偽。」王肅注：「慢，簡略也。」 「 慢 」亦指放鬆、無節制。《孟子‧滕文公上》：「經界不正，井田不鈞，穀祿不平，是故暴君汙吏必慢其經界。」 雜曲曲調名也稱為「 慢 」。明楊慎《升庵詩話》卷十二：「慢字為樂曲名。」
From the " heart" and " man" sound, the original meaning is laziness and laziness. "Said Wen": "Idleness. From the heart, graceful. One said: Slow, not fearful." "Xunzi ‧ Meticulous": "A gentleman is generous but not slow." Tang Yangli's note: "The same as slow. Laziness too." " Slow" can mean arrogance. "Yi·XiCi": "Slow up and down violently, thievery and violent." Kong Yingdashu: "The villain at the top will be arrogant, and below will be tyrannical." " Slow" also means contempt. "Thirty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "I am far away and slow." Du pre-note: "Slow, easy." " Slow" also means slow travel. "Poetry. Zheng Feng. Uncle Yu Tian": "Uncle Ma is slow to avoid, but uncle is seldom." Zheng Xuanjian: "When the field is finished, the horse will be late." The meaning of slow action can be extended to slow. Tang Bai Juyi "Pipa Xing": "Cross lightly and slowly twist and pick." " Slow" also means not solid. "Huainanzi ‧ Shi Zexun": "Fortifications are slow, and as an obscene skill, they must commit their sins." Gao Yin's note: "Slow, not fast." " Slow" also refers to simplicity. "Confucius's Family Language-Confucianism": "It is as slow as it is slow, and as if it is false." Wang Su's note: "Slow, simple." " Slow" also refers to relaxation and intemperance. "Mencius-Teng Wen Gong 1": "The realm of Confucianism is not righteous, the mine field is not good, and the land of the valley is not fair, so tyrants and corrupt officials will slow down their realm." Miscellaneous tunes are also called " slow". Ming Yang Shen's "Sheng'an Shihua" Volume 12: "The slow word is the name of the music."

慢字的基本解释

慢
màn
迟缓，速度小，与“快”相对：慢车。慢件。慢腾腾。慢条斯理。缓慢。迟慢。慢性。
态度冷淡，不殷勤，不礼貌：慢待。轻慢。傲慢。怠慢。
缓急快

慢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［màn］
［《廣韻》謨晏切，去諫，明。］
“命2”的被通假字。
(1)轻忽；怠忽。
(2)骄傲；怠慢。
(3)缓行；缓慢。
(4)引申指趋于和缓、从缓。
(5)不坚实；松弛。
(6)简略；闲散。
(7)放松；无节制。
(8)杂曲曲调名。
(9)用同“曼”。妩媚；美好。
(10)用同“謾”、“漫”。任由；徒然。
(11)用同“謾”、“漫”。隐瞞。
(12)通“墁”。涂抹。

慢字的英文翻译

◎ 慢
defer, slow, supercilious, tardiness

慢字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页399第12
【廣韻】謨晏切【集韻】【正韻】莫晏切【韻會】莫綰切，?音縵。【說文】惰也。从心曼聲。一曰不畏也。【廣韻】怠也，倨也，緩也。【朱子曰】慢，放肆也。　又或作僈。【荀子·不苟篇】寬而不僈。亦作謾。【前漢·董仲舒傳】桀紂暴謾。　又【大學】舉而不能先命也。【鄭氏云】命，讀爲慢。　又【集韻】亦作漫。詳水部漫字註。　又【集韻】䁕見切，音麫。慢訑，弛縱意。　又【集韻】謨官切，音瞞。惑也。　又叶民堅切，音眠。【古詩】太古之不慢兮，禮義之不愆兮。　又叶莫半切，音幔。【謝惠連·秋懷詩】夷險難預謀，倚伏昧前算。雖好相如達，不同長卿慢。

考證：〔【大學】舉而不能先命也。【鄭氏云】命，當作慢。〕　謹照原文當作改讀爲。
慢字的源字形

慢字的起名意思

：迟缓，速度小，与“快”相对。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Сердце (↑) означает, что сценарий печати подобен сердцу, что означает, что он связан с человеческой психологией; Человек (человек) означает звук, человек имеет длинное значение, что означает, что ленивый человек откладывает на потом.
Прокрастинация.
Первоначальный смысл - лень и небрежность.
Расширение происходит медленно.
①Низкая скорость; медленнее: ~ уровень автомобиля 1 ~ | ~ руки ~ ноги.

медленный
медленный
писец
màn
I прил./наречие
1) медленный, медлительный, неторопливый; медленно, неторопливо, тихо, не спеша
太慢 слишком медленно
不快不慢 ни быстро, ни медленно
你慢一点儿走, 等等他 ты иди помедленней, подожди его
2) ленивый, нерадивый, небрежный
君子宽而不慢 совершенный человек великодушен, но не нерадив (не небрежен)
3) среднекит. напрасный, тщетный; понапрасну, зря
花莫慢轻掷 зря не бросай с презреньем цветы
琼英慢好, 与何人比? и зря прекрасны дивные цветы: с кем их сравнить? любимой нет
4) беспорядочный, распущенный; неумеренный, разнузданный
刑慢 в наказаниях (преступникам) нет порядка
5) скудный, недостаточный; убогий; недостойный
慢葬 убогие (недостойные) похороны
6) хрупкий, ломкий
工事苦慢 работы трудны и непрочны
II гл.
1) отставать на (напр. о часах); идти медленно
我的表慢五分钟 мои часы отстают на пять минут
叔马慢忌 * лошади Шу задержали свой ход
2) медлить; постой, погоди, не надо
请你慢夸口 нечего тебе, пожалуйста, хвастаться!
且慢 погоди!; постой!; не так рьяно!
3) не придавать значения, недооценивать, низко ставить
可敬不可慢 заслуживать уважения, но никак не небрежения
他也自心下慢了 он и сам не придал этому никакого значения
慢法 не придавать значения законам
4) * замазывать, пятнать
垩慢 замазать (запятнать) глиной
5) среднекит. скрывать, прятать
慢不过 никак не скрыть
慢下 скрыть, спрятать
III сущ.
кит. муз. мань (протяжная мелодия размером в 8 долей такта; эпоха Тан — Сун)
扬州慢 янчжоуская мань
Radicals: 忄, 日, 罒, 又  (soul, sun, net, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
If your soul is acting like the sun trapped in a net sitting on a stool, then people will ridicule you for your laziness. You're just sitting there, trapped and not moving.
Your soul just doesn't want to move or do anything though... and that may look like laziness, but you can't help it. You wish your friends and family wouldn't ridicule you. You're going through enough, internally.
Reading Mnemonic
When people ridicule you, when you can't stop the laziness, you read manga (まん). Manga helps you feel better about the mean things people say. Manga helps you feel like you're doing something, and that you aren't just a lazy person.
Picture yourself reading manga and watch as the people who ridicule you and call you lazy fade away into the background. You're going to be okay.
